p: The contact angle (CA) of purified BS was determined at CMC solution on Teflon (highly hydrophobic), glass (highly hydrophilic) and parafilm (intermediate) as per the procedure described by Hamza et al. (2017). Emulsification properties of BS against various hydrophobic substrates like hexadecane, kerosene, toluene, coconut oil and castor oil were carried out as per the emulsification assay explained by Satpute et al. (2010b). Water and sodium dodecyl sulfate (SDS) (CMC solution 8 mM) were considered as negative and positive control, respectively.
